mildsteel.name: TMT Bars
mildsteel.description: TMT means Thermo Mechanical Treatment, which is a thermomechanical process; These TMT steel bars are generally used material in construction for enhanced protection against earthquakes and other types of natural disasters. To ensure the safety of your structure TMT steel bars should be resistant to corrosion which helps to obtain a longer life for your structure.

mildsteel.name: MS Sheets/Plates
mildsteel.description: Mild steel (MS) sheets and plates, known for their strength, durability, and workability, are essential construction materials used across various industries for structural components, automotive parts, and manufacturing equipment.

mildsteel.name: MS Channels
mildsteel.description: Mild Steel (MS) channels, featuring a U-shaped cross-section, are essential structural components characterized by high strength and rigidity, commonly used in construction, manufacturing, and engineering for applications such as load-bearing frameworks, support systems, and bracing due to their excellent mechanical properties and ease of fabrication.

specification.length: 6 meters and 12 meters, custom lengths available

mildsteel.name: MS Beams/Joists
mildsteel.description: Mild Steel Beams & Joists, commonly known as steel I-beams or H-beams, are essential structural elements characterized by their I or H-shaped cross-section. These beams are designed to support heavy loads and provide excellent stability and strength in construction projects.

mildsteel.name: MS Angles
mildsteel.description: Mild Steel (MS) angles, featuring an L-shaped profile and composed of low carbon steel with alloying elements like manganese and silicon, are widely employed in construction and manufacturing for their structural support capabilities.

specification.length: 6 meters and 12 meters, custom lengths available

mildsteel.name: MS Square Pipe
mildsteel.description: Mild Steel (MS) square pipes, characterized by their hollow, square cross-section and composed of low-carbon steel, are integral structural elements widely utilized across industries for their robustness and durability.

specification.length: 6 meters and 12 meters, custom lengths available

mildsteel.name: MS Round Bars
mildsteel.description: Mild Steel (MS) round bars are cylindrical steel bars known for their excellent strength, ductility, and weldability, making them widely used in construction, manufacturing, and engineering applications.

specification.length: 6 meters and 12 meters, custom lengths available

mildsteel.name: HR Coils
mildsteel.description: Hot-rolled steel coils have a rougher surface finish due to the scaling that occurs during the heating process. These coils are generally more ductile and have a higher tolerance for deformation.

mildsteel.name: CR Coils
mildsteel.description: Cold Rolled (CR) coils are steel sheets that have been processed through a rolling mill at room temperature, achieving more precise dimensions and a smoother surface finish.

stainlesssteel.name: SS Sheets/Plates
stainlesssteel.description: Stainless Steel sheets and plates are flat steel products made from high-quality stainless steel, known for their exceptional strength, durability, and resistance to corrosion.

stainlesssteel.name: SS Coils
stainlesssteel.description: SS coils are flat-rolled steel products made from high-quality stainless steel, known for their exceptional strength, durability, and corrosion resistance.

stainlesssteel.name: SS ERW Pipes
stainlesssteel.description: Stainless Steel Electric Resistance Welded (ERW) Pipes are known for their high durability and corrosion resistance, suitable for structural and piping applications.

specification.diameter: 1/8” NB to 36” NB, 1/4” OD to 36” OD

stainlesssteel.name: SS Round Pipes
stainlesssteel.description: Stainless Steel (SS) round bars are cylindrical metal bars made from high-quality stainless steel, known for their exceptional strength, durability, and corrosion resistance.

stainlesssteel.name: SS Square Bars
stainlesssteel.description: SS square bars are high-quality metal bars with a square cross-section, known for their exceptional strength, durability, and corrosion resistance.

stainlesssteel.name: SS Angles
stainlesssteel.description: Stainless Steel (SS) angles are structural steel products with an L-shaped cross-section, known for their exceptional strength, durability, and corrosion resistance.
